style.name: ShowTable
style.description: These settings govern the generation and display of the table panel.

option.name: PanelFieldOrder
option.description: Specifies the field ordering within the panel.

option.name: PanelHeading
option.description: Places a title heading above the panel.

option.name: ExpandCollapse
option.description: Place an 'Expand and Collapse Toggle' button on the panel.

option.name: ColumnHeadings
option.description: Places a column heading row above the table grid.

option.name: PaginationControl
option.description: Places pagination control on the panel.

option.name: PageSize
option.description: The number of rows displayed on-screen at one time in a Table panel. Use the Pagination control to move from page to page. Use the PageSize pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls.

option.name: PanelStyle
option.description: Enable scrolling in the data grid portion of the panel.

option.name: ColumnSorting
option.description: Enable column sorting for all appropriate columns in the panel.

option.name: LinkForeignKey
option.displayname: Automatically link foreign key field to
option.description: Creates hypertext links for foreign key fields in the panel. Allows users to click through to the underlying record.

option.name: HideDataUntilSearched
option.description: Initially hides data display. Displays data when user clicks 'Go'. Use the HideDataUntilSearched pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: InitialRowDisplayStyle
option.description: Specifies the initial panel layout when the page is first displayed. Use the InitialRowDisplay pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls.

option.name: RowDisplayAction
option.description: Specifies how to handle expanding and collapsing table rows when the ‘Expand’ button is clicked. Use the RowDisplayAction pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls.

optionitem.displayname: Expand selected row and collapse other rows

optiongroup.name: Filters
optiongroup.description: These settings govern the generation and display of data filters.

option.name: FieldFilters
option.description: Add up to two filters on the panel.

option.name: FieldFilterType
option.description: The type of filters to create for text fields (non-numeric and non-date fields). Use the Display tab in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. List box filters are Enterprise Edition only features.

option.name: SearchControl
option.description: Add a search control on the panel.

optiongroup.name: TableButtons
optiongroup.description: Add these buttons to Show Table panels.

option.name: NewButton
option.description: Places an 'Add Record' button in the panel's tool bar.

option.name: EditButton
option.description: Places an 'Edit Record' button in the panel's tool bar. This button is generated only if a primary key or virtual primary key is present.

option.name: CopyButton
option.description: Places a 'Copy Record' button in the panel's tool bar. This button is generated only if a primary key or virtual primary key is present.

option.name: DeleteButton
option.description: Places a 'Delete Record' button in the panel's tool bar. This button is generated only if a primary key or virtual primary key is present.

option.name: PDFButton
option.description: Places a 'PDF Report' button in the panel's tool bar. The human-readable Portable Document Format (PDF) file can be emailed. (Professional and Enterprise Editions only.)

option.name: WordButton
option.description: Places a 'Word Report' button in the panel's tool bar. The human-readable Microsoft Word Document Format file can be emailed. (Professional and Enterprise Editions only.)

option.name: ExportExcelButton
option.description: Places an 'Export to Excel' button in the panel's tool bar. The exported XML file can be read directly by Microsoft Excel. (Professional and Enterprise Editions only.)

option.name: ExportButton
option.description: Places an 'Export to CSV' button in the panel's tool bar. The exported Comma Separated Value (CSV) file can be imported into a variety of applications. (Professional and Enterprise Editions only.)

option.name: ImportButton
option.description: Places an 'Import data' button in the panel's tool bar. The Data Import Wizard imports an ASCII comma separated value file. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: RefreshButton
option.description: Places a 'Refresh data' button in the panel's tool bar. (Professional and Enterprise Editions only.)

option.name: ResetButton
option.description: Places a 'Reset filters' button in the panel's tool bar. (Professional and Enterprise Editions only.)

optiongroup.name: TableRowButtons
optiongroup.description: Add these buttons to each table row.

option.name: RowExpandCollapseRowButton
option.description: Places an ‘Expand/collapse row’ button in each table row. This button is generated only for certain layouts.

option.name: RowUpdatePanelsButton
option.description: Places an ‘Update related panel’ button in each table row. This button is generated only if there are related panels on the page not enclosed within this table.

option.name: RowViewButton
option.description: Places a 'Show Record' button in each table row. This button is generated only if a primary key or virtual primary key is present.

option.name: RowEditButton
option.description: Places an 'Edit Record' button in each table row. This button is generated only if a primary key or virtual primary key is present.

option.name: RowCopyButton
option.description: Places a 'Copy Record' button in in each table row. This button is generated only if a primary key or virtual primary key is present.

option.name: RowDeleteButton
option.description: Places a 'Delete Record' button in each table row. This button is generated only if a primary key or virtual primary key is present.

option.name: RowSelectionCheckbox
option.description: Places a checkbox control in each table row.

optiongroup.name: MasterPages
optiongroup.description: Options controlling master page creation.

option.name: ContentPlaceHolderID
option.description: Specify the master page identifier to use in generated pages. Be sure your default master page also uses this value for its contentplaceholder. If changed modify ApplicationWebForm.js

optiongroup.name: PageOptions
optiongroup.description: Add these controls to appropriate pages.

optiongroup.name: PageOptions
optiongroup.description: Add these controls to appropriate pages.

option.displayname: Add an 'Add Record' button next to dropdown list
option.description: Place an 'Add Record' button next to dropdown lists in Table and Record panels. Allows users to quickly add entries to dropdown lists. (Enterprise Edition only.)

optiongroup.name: SharePointSpecificOptions
optiongroup.description: Options for SharePoint applications.

optiongroup.name: MasterPages
optiongroup.description: Options controlling SharePoint master page creation.

option.name: ContentPlaceHolderId_PlaceHolderPageTitle
option.description: Specify the page title content identifier to use in generated pages. Be sure your default master page also uses this value for its page title placeholder. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: ContentPlaceHolderId_PlaceHolderMain
option.description: Specify the main content identifier to use in generated pages. Be sure your default master page also uses this value for its main content placeholder. If changed modify ApplicationWebForm.js. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: UseSharePointDefaultMasterPage
option.displayname: Use Microsoft SharePoint default master page
option.description: Use the Microsoft SharePoint default master page as your pages' master page. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: DefaultTopLevelMasterPage
option.description: Specifies the master page to use for your pages. (Enterprise Edition only.)

optiongroup.name: GeneralAppOptions
optiongroup.description: These options apply globally to your application and take effect when you next rebuild your application.

optiongroup.name: SignInPage
optiongroup.description: These settings govern the generation and display of controls on the Sign-In page.

option.name: RememberUserCheckbox
option.description: Places a 'Remember User' option next to the User Name field in the Sign-In panel. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: RememberPasswordCheckbox
option.description: Places a 'Remember Password' option next to the Password field in the Sign-In panel. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: SignInCheckBox
option.description: Places an 'Automatically Sign-in' option in the Sign-In panel. (Enterprise Edition only.)

optiongroup.name: PageHeader
optiongroup.description: Add these controls to the page header.

option.name: SkipNavigationLink
option.displayname: Add 'Skip Navigation Links' link at top of page for Section 508 Compliance
option.description: Allow users to skip over repetitive navigation links by clicking on a 'Skip Navigation Links' link at the top of the page. (Professional and Enterprise Editions only.)

optiongroup.name: UpperToolBar
optiongroup.description: Add these controls to the upper right corner of pages.

option.name: SelectTheme
option.displayname: Add a 'Select Theme' dropdown list to the page header
option.description: Places a 'Select Theme' dropdown list in the page header area. Allows users to select the theme of the web page. (Enterprise Editions only.)

option.name: SetLanguageButton
option.displayname: Add a 'Select Language' dropdown list to the page header
option.description: Places a 'Select Language' dropdown list in the page header area. Allows users to select the language of the web page.

option.name: PrintPageButton
option.displayname: Add a 'Print Page' button to the page header
option.description: Places a 'Print Page' button in the page header area. Allows users to print the web page.

option.name: SignInButton
option.displayname: Add a 'SignIn' button and link to the page header
option.description: Places a 'SignIn'/'SignOut' button and link in the page header area. Allows users to sign in and sign out.

option.name: ShowSignInStatus
option.description: Displays user sign-in status at the top of the page when security is enabled.

optiongroup.name: PageControls
optiongroup.description: These settings govern the generation and display of various page controls.

option.name: CalendarControl
option.displayname: Add calendar control for date fields
option.description: Generate date selectors adjacent to date input fields.

option.name: IncrementDecrementButton
option.description: Add increment and decrement buttons for date, number and currency fields. Use the EnableIncrementDecrementButtons pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls.

option.name: MaximumListBoxSize
option.description: The maximum number of items to place in a list box at application run-time. Use the MaxGeneratedItems pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls.

option.name: SmoothPanelUpdate
option.description: Enables the Ajax-based smooth panel update feature. Table and Record panels update independently and without postback flicker. Use the SmoothPanelUpdate pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls.

optiongroup.name: TextControls
optiongroup.description: These settings govern the generation and display of pop-up controls for large text fields.

option.name: DisplayTextAs
option.description: Display the field content as HTML source or rich text. Use the HTMLEncodeValue pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls.

option.name: RichTextThreshold
option.displayname: Threshold to display rich text (# chars)
option.description: Display the field content as rich text when fields are larger than this value.

option.name: LimitTextOnPage
option.displayname: Limit text on page to (# chars)
option.description: Limits the number of text characters displayed for the field. Use the FieldMaxLength pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. (Professional and Enterprise Editions only.)

optiongroup.name: SearchControls
optiongroup.description: These settings govern the generation and display of search controls.

option.name: AutoTypeahead
option.description: Display a list of possible results as the user types. Use the AutoTypeAhead pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: SearchFor
option.description: Specifies text matching criteria to compliment the database search operator. Use the AutoTypeAheadSearch pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: DisplayMatchedText
option.description: Specifies where to display the matched text in the surrounding string. Use the AutoTypeAheadDisplayFoundText pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: TypeaheadDelay
option.displayname: Type-ahead delay before retrieving suggestion list (milliseconds)
option.description: Retrieve suggestion list after this length of time. Use the AutoTypeAheadDelay pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: MinimumCharacter
option.description: Minimum number of characters that must be entered before the suggestion list is displayed. Use the AutoTypeAheadMinChars pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: SuggestionListSize
option.description: Maximum number of suggestions displayed in the type-ahead suggestion list. Use the AutoTypeAhead pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. Use the AutoTypeAheadListSize pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: WordSeparationCharacters
option.description: Specifies the characters that indicate word breaks using a regular expression. Use the AutoTypeAheadWordSeparators pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. (Enterprise Edition only.)

optiongroup.name: LargeListSelectorControls
optiongroup.description: These settings govern the generation and display of large list selector controls for list box fields.

option.name: DisplayLargeListSelector
option.description: Display large list selectors controls next to dropdown lists when the number of items exceeds a threshold.

option.name: LargeListSelectorThreshold
option.description: Displays large list selector controls next to dropdown lists when the number of list items exceeds this threshold. Use the MinListItems pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls.

optiongroup.name: PopupTextControls
optiongroup.description: These settings govern the generation and display of pop-up controls for large text fields.

option.name: DisplayPopupForStringField
option.description: Display a pop-up when the application user mouses over large text fields. The text in the individual field must exceeds the Minimum pop-up threshold. Use the PopupDisplay pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls.

option.name: DisplayPopupThreshold
option.displayname: Display pop-up when text exceeds (# chars)
option.description: Display a pop-up for large text fields if the string length exceeds this value. Use the PopupThreshold pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls.

optiongroup.name: PopupImageControls
optiongroup.description: These settings govern the generation and display of pop-up controls for image fields.

option.name: ImageFieldPopup
option.description: Display a pop-up when the application user mouses over image fields. Use the PopupDisplay pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls.

option.name: ThumbnailSize
option.description: Scale images displayed on underlying web pages to a percentage (0 to 100%) of their actual size. Pop-up display must be enabled for image scaling. Use the ImagePercentSize pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls.

optiongroup.name: RichTextEditorControls
optiongroup.description: These settings govern the use of rich text editor controls.

option.name: RichTextEditorThreshold
option.displayname: Threshold for rich text editor (# chars)
option.description: Use the rich text editor for fields larger than this value. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: RichTextEditor
option.description: Specifies the rich text editor to use for fields larger than the threshold. Use the RichTextEditorType pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. (Enterprise Edition only.)

optiongroup.name: RTERecordControls
optiongroup.description: Controls rich text editor settings when used within record panels.

option.name: Width
option.description: Specifies the width of the rich text editor window in pixels. Use the RichTextEditorWidth pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: Height
option.description: Specifies the height of the rich text editor window in pixels. Use the RichTextEditorHeight pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: RichTextMenuToolbar
option.displayname: Show rich text editor menu toolbar
option.description: Displays the rich text editor menu toolbar. Use the RichTextEditorShowToolbar pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. (Enterprise Edition only.)

optiongroup.name: RTETableControls
optiongroup.description: Controls rich text editor settings when used within table panels.

option.name: Width
option.description: Specifies the width of the rich text editor window in pixels. Use the RichTextEditorWidth pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: Height
option.description: Specifies the height of the rich text editor window in pixels. Use the RichTextEditorHeight pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. (Enterprise Edition only.)

option.name: RichTextMenuToolbar
option.displayname: Show rich text editor menu toolbar
option.description: Displays the rich text editor menu toolbar. Use the RichTextEditorShowToolbar pass-through attribute in the Properties dialog to set individual controls. (Enterprise Edition only.)

optiongroup.name: Security
optiongroup.description: These settings govern the application security.

option.name: EncryptURL
option.description: Encrypts URL parameters so that database primary key values are not visible. (Enterprise Edition only.)
